paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

val rdd = sc.parallelize(
    Array(
        Row("Alice", 13), 
        Row("Bob", 12)
    ))
val schema = StructType(
    StructField("name", StringType, true) ::
    StructField("age", IntegerType, true) ::
    Nil
)
val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(rdd, schema)

df.collect().foreach(println)

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructField
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.StringType
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.IntegerType

val schema = StructType(
    StructField("age", IntegerType) ::
    StructField("height", IntegerType) ::
    StructField("name", StringType) ::
    StructField("sex", StringType) ::
    Nil
    )
val csv3 = sqlContext.read.schema(schema).csv("/user/training/data/persons_headerless.csv")
csv3.toZeppelin()

import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._

val result = persons.select("name")

result.toZeppelin()

result.msg:
name
Alice
Bob
Charlie
Eve
Frances
George

result.toZeppelin()

paragraphs.text:
val df = sc.parallelize(1 to 100).toDF
val result = df.select(
    sum('value).alias("sum"), 
    avg('value).alias("avg"), 
    min('value).alias("min"), 
    max('value).alias("max"), 
    count('value).alias("count")
)

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sc.parallelize(Array("Alice","Bob","Alice")).toDF
val result = df.distinct()

result.toZeppelin()

val result = persons.groupBy('sex)
    .agg(
        avg('age) as "avg_age",
        min('height) as "min_height",
        max('height) as "max_height"
    )

result.toZeppelin()

paragraphs.text:
val funny = sqlContext.udf.register("funny", {s:String => s.zipWithIndex.map(kv => if (kv._2 % 2 == 1) kv._1.toLower else kv._1.toUpper).mkString("")})

val result = persons.select(funny('name) as "funny_name")

result.toZeppelin()

result.msg:

BoB
ChArLiE

FrAnCeS
GeOrGe

result.toZeppelin()

paragraphs.text:
val text = sqlContext.read.text("/user/training/data/alice-in-wonderland.txt")
val words = text.select(explode(split('value," ")).alias("word")).filter('word !== lit(""))
val counts = words.groupBy($"word").count().sort($"count".desc)

counts.toZeppelin(20)
